item.description:
DESCRIPTION: We will start brainstorming for our Fall 2012 Retreat at this open studio. Bring ideas, magazine clippings with projects, samples, etc. This first meeting will be to review all the feedback from the 2011 retreat and start compiling a master list of ideas for the upcoming retreat.  No final decisions will be made and all ideas, no matter how simple/complex/silly/expensive are encouraged and welcome.

 

This has been changed from an open studio to strictly a planning meeting. Only people interested in planning the retreat should attend.


COST: Free

AMENITIES: Free parking. Table space and a chair. Access to a fridge, microwave, toaster oven, kitchen sink and restroom. Dinner in or out, if people are interested.

CANCELLATIONS: In the unlikely event that we need to cancel---or even if we're just getting a late start--we'll post a message on the Web site and e-mail everyone who's RSVP'd "yes." So to be on the safe side, please check the Web site and your inbox before departing for ArtStudio 360!

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: Fall Retreat 2012 Planning Kick-off
